terms: Open any of the UPI applications.
Scan the UPI QR code provided here.
Make sure you are paying through your own bank account linked to the UPI application. 4. Authorize your payment transfer using your UPI pin.
Order will be automatically released once you complete the payment.
The order will not be released against 3rd party payments/ payment made using someone else's UPI account.
Please do not make multiple payments to the same QR code.
Please reach out to the customer support team in case the UPI payment gets stuck in pending status and the P2P order gets canceled after timeout.
